body:

 F2S +W3

title: Flow AcroIyengar sequence 1
body:
Bow
St. Throne
Ninja throne (skandasana)
Parivritta janu sisrsasana (bend to nin th.)
Mermaid
Garudasana (aka thinker aka whirly)
Parsvakonasana (twisted W1)
Tree (flamingo)
Utkatasana
Uttanasana
A.M.Swasana (d.dog f.hands on b.elbows)
Paschimotanasana
Janu sirsasana (fwd)
+Ustrasana
Balasana

title: Flow Acrovinyasa 1
body:
https://youtu.be/YNFFkIFrWgg
bird, bow
1/2 bhekasana, shalabasana (thight sup), stag climbers
F2S, utka, sides, padangusth
chair, 1/2 padma sides, whale
straddle throne, mermaid
f.leaf, prasaritta twist, vashistasana (tictoc to 2nd side)
hangle dangle, float.paschi,
stag back bird, fish, back bow, nataraj, navasan, back plank
back candle, bat, star (1/2 barrel to bird)
S2F, garuda (eagle), ustrasan (camel), child
baka (sup shoulderstand), stag, (front) candle, stag
s.yogi, rev.nam, walnut,
turntable (straddle baby bat shoulder stretch)

title: Suga Mama Flow
body:
#flow #method #theacroguru
 IN opt.:
 Walk in jump Slide from F2s  Bird
F2S
F2m ++trono jamón
(+++S2F, Chair, Stand on thights, Flag and back)
Couch
(++ C.P.S., C.P.W., C.P.Shins)
b.s.whip
(+++ballerina, pop to L-Sit on armpits)
Mermaid (machine)
F.Leaf +p.twist
+Star ++Paschi on Star
OUT: Floating Paschi
 *insert below machines at the poses that they begin in, in the above flow
 v2.0 machines to insert:
 Sw.Beauty Buddha roll Cath’s wheel Nunchuck D.Buster W.Rumpus Espresso shot Attitude Barrel roll M.Frog  v2.1 machines to insert:
 Attitude Sweeping beauty Ballerina Wild rumpus D.Buster Espresso shot Barrel roll Ninja bats   v2.2:
 Sw.Beauty Cath’s wheel Tumble weed Wild rumpus Espresso shot Barrell roll   Flow v3B: Simplify: no sugar added
IN: Handstand fall back
Mermaid
Pop Th 2 Bird
b.s.Whip
P.twist
M.Frog
F.Paschi

title: yo'lil' grasshopper flow
body:
#flow #method #theacroguru
 v1:
IN: Sidestar
Ninja
4Steps
Ninja Steps
Naked S. (“el pollo ninja”)
1/2 p.pocket
biglemoi +drop to
cath’s wheel
mermaid, +from L-Sit:
sweeping beauty
corkscrew
tumble weed
–king of thrones / twist to
koala
OUT: from koala HS out sideways
 v2:
++at cath’s wheel:
+b.rev bird catch on:
bird2H
mermaid
v3:
pollo ninja –> nataraj
v3.3 (possibles):
Corkscrew + rev.star tumbleweed
?B.Barrell + hi ninja, redrum
v4:
++big barrell / b.bro
Spider roll 2.0 to M.frog
